alertShopDomainShouldExists.title: Shop URL not filled in!
alertShopDomainShouldExists.message:
Only shop with an assigned URL can be associated to a PrestaShop account.
The following shops don't have an assigned URL:

account.title: Associate your shop with a PrestaShop account
account.authorize: You can only associate your shop with one account. So be sure to choose the right one!
account.authorized: Your shop is associated with the PrestaShop account:
account.authorizedPartially: Your shops are partially associated with a PrestaShop Account
account.authorizedSeveral: Your shops are associated with several PrestaShop account
account.moduleUpdateInformation:
New update: you can manage your associated shops.
Please reassociate yourself using the same email address to benefit from this update.
Other module updates may be available in the Updates tab of the module manager.
account.emailNotVerified: A confirmation email has been sent. Check your inbox and click on the link to activate your account.
account.needToBeAdmin: In order to proceed you need to be administrator of the shop
